type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Allow Anvil Enchant

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/allow_anvil_enchant)

Allows a `PlayerEntity` to enchant an item with specified enchants that may not have been accessible to an item before.

Type ID: `apugli:allow_anvil_enchant`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Allow Anvil Enchant

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/allow_anvil_enchant)

Allows a `PlayerEntity` to enchant an item with specified enchants that may not have been accessible to an item before.

Type ID: `apugli:allow_anvil_enchant`



---

enchantment.description: If set, this will determine a new enchantment that can be put on an item that meets conditions.
enchantment.markdownDescription: If set, this will determine a new enchantment that can be put on an item that meets conditions.

enchantments.description: If set, this will determine the new enchantments that can be put on an item that meets conditions.
enchantments.markdownDescription: If set, this will determine the new enchantments that can be put on an item that meets conditions.

compare_to.description: The enchantment level of the item in the middle slot of the anvil to check for.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The enchantment level of the item in the middle slot of the anvil to check for.

comparison.description: The comparison applied the the enchantment level of the item in the middle. If this comparison isn't met, you are unable to enchant the item.
comparison.markdownDescription: The comparison applied the the enchantment level of the item in the middle. If this comparison isn't met, you are unable to enchant the item.

item_condition.description: The item condition that an item must meet to be able to be enchanted through this power.
item_condition.markdownDescription: The item condition that an item must meet to be able to be enchanted through this power.
